posts.post_content:
Posted By: Misunderestimated (Brian H.)
Strong front images -- grading is largely the result of the backs or the cuts of the cards (see scans). Prices includes shipping/insurance (paypal accepted) first to email me accepting at these prices gets the card(s). 
bhodes@rcn.com

"Mike Tiernan SGC 30/2 $250"  Nice image of the the New York slugger witht eh .310 lifetime BA; slanted cut & scrapbook removal evident on reverse & subtle pencil writing. NOW OM EBAY

"Tip O'Neill SGC 50/4 $400" - Actually the photo is supposedly Bill White -- (I guess this beats the '69 Aurelio Rodrguez card by over 80 yrs). Scuff and subtle wrinkle on otherwise clean back)  --> THE O'NEIL SOLD ON eBay...
